description: It’s the must-have mobile app for those living, working and enjoying all the Pikes Peak Region has to offer. Stay connected wherever you go with the official companion to The Gazette, the daily newspaper for Colorado Springs and the Pikes Peak Region. Get high-quality news around the clock from our trusted writers and bloggers. Access top news stories plus sports, entertainment, military news, videos and much more. Simple design helps you find content quickly and easily. Customize your news and favorites with “My News.” Save stories for reading later. Share content through E-Mail, Facebook and Twitter. If you like our App spread the word to friends on Facebook and Twitter.  The Colorado Springs Gazette app is an ad-supported application.
